channel.title: LimeZ - Quicksand [Dubstep/Trap] (3:01 and feedback?)
channel.description:
I just noticed Ruthless was 3:01 too... coincidence? Nah. Well here’s Quicksand :P
https://soundcloud.com/dubbtrasx/quicksand

item.title: LimeZ - Quicksand [Dubstep/Trap] (3:01 and feedback?)
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Noice. I like it.

One suggestion is that during the first drop, you might want to make the fills a bit louder as they don’t sound as loud as the stabs. That or reduce some of the ducker as it’s too hard.

Additionally on the second drop, in the beginning u have some bars that just the bass playing a solid note and it feels like it’s going on a bit long. Could u add some sort of variation? Like maybe on the 4th u go a step up or down, something like that

Read full topic
